title: Senior Project Portfolio
description: Creation of a portfolio of original and substantially revised work. Significant research, revision, and editing in a workshop setting. 3 lectures and portfolio project.
prerequisites: Senior standing; completion of the GWR; four of the following: ENGL 203, ENGL 204, ENGL 205, ENGL 303, ENGL 304, ENGL 305; and three of the following: ENGL 430, ENGL 431, ENGL 432, ENGL 439, ENGL 449, ENGL 459
